title: 大家喜欢玩Minecraft还是Terraria？
author: hkw7979
txt_content:
偶也《09号服务器的毁灭》第6集已出
地址http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5471-1-1.html

replies.author: pathfinder
replies.txt_content:
MC不解释……
对我来说Terraria只是一时新罢了……

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content: MC中文論壇... 還能不支持MC嗎?

replies.author: j77o88o
replies.txt_content: 打怪什么的....没多大兴趣

replies.author: wyr1998526
replies.txt_content: MC和T都不错，各有所长，各有所短，交替玩别有风味。但感觉还是MC好些。

replies.author: kk08923
replies.txt_content:
MC和平有爱，
MC蜘蛛无爱。

超怕蜘蛛。。。
各有所长把，一个2D一个3D。都挺好
